synopsis.text:
Eri and the other members of µ's find themselves in a perplexing situation when Maki, one of their friends, is absent from school after sharing a chilling nightmare with Hanayo. In her dream, Maki was pursued by enigmatic figures, leaving her too frightened to attend school.

Deciding to lift Maki's spirits, the group sets off to visit her at home. However, their journey takes an unexpected turn when they encounter a spectral, younger version of Maki. Adding to the mystery, they cross paths with a strange girl who seems to manipulate reality, transforming the world into a dreamlike state.

Meanwhile, Eri returns to the school to retrieve a forgotten textbook and finds herself following an eerie shadow. As the boundaries between dreams and reality blur, Eri and the other members of µ's brace themselves for an extraordinary encounter that awaits them in this surreal world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
